Key Match Events: Gerrit Cole suffered a loss with 4.1 IP, 5 H, 7 ER, 2 K, 3 BB
Rafael Devers' intentional walk sparked a three-run fourth inning
Jose Torres singled to right, Volpe scored in the third inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox won the series 3-1 against the Yankees
The game was played at Yankee Stadium, with an attendance of 46,378
Others: The game ended with a final score of 7-1 in favor of the Red Sox
The Yankees' starting pitcher was Gerrit Cole, while the Red Sox's starting pitcher was Brayan Bello
